cards.caption: Shelby American Museum

sections: Make a donation to the Shelby American Collection and be entered to win the fastest production Mustang to date - the 2020 Shelby GT500.
There is a chance to take home a rare Mustang that also happens to be the fastest production pony car off the Blue Oval assembly line to date, the epic
. Packed with a potent factory 760-horsepower, this new
was designed to be the ultimate driver's car. Visit the
and make a donation by using this promo code
"SHELBY8" and increase your chances to win one epic Mustang.

Ford Performance Blue and adorned with white painted "over-the-top" white stripes, this rare Shelby is one of the greatest Mustangs ever built. The example being offered is equipped with the Carbon Fiber Track Package which makes this car even more rare. This GT500 features exposed 20-inch carbon fiber wheels wrapped with Ford-spec Michelin Pilot Cup Sport 2 rubber (305/30/R20 front, 315/30/R20 rear), a GT4 carbon fiber track rear wing, carbon fiber rear diffuser, large front splitter and splitter wickers, and hood vent with rain tray. Driving at night is not an issue thanks to the HID headlamps complete with LED Signature Lighting. Another fun feature are the
puddle lamps that illuminate at night, and turn signal mirrors give an extra heads up when switching lanes.

is a supercharged 5.2-liter Cross Plane crank V8 engine that generates an impressive 760-horsepower and 625 lb/ft of torque. Shifting is handled by a 7-speed dual-clutch transmission that twists a rear limited-slip Torsen differential stuffed with 3.73 gears. Sturdy enough to handle the copious amount of power is a composite carbon fiber driveshaft. An independent rear suspension complete with MagneRide helps plant the car to the ground while keeping handling in check.

Stopping power comes from massive Brembo brakes with 6-piston calipers up front and 4-piston calipers out back, the most powerful brakes given to any production Mustang. Equipped with performance aerodynamics and a race-built chassis, this new

and performance come from the dual exhaust with active valves with spent gases exiting through quad tips. More features include a Magnesium tower to tower brace, updated chassis tuning, and adjustable strut top mounts along with coolers for the engine oil, transmission, and differential. The car comes with a tire inflator and sealant kit, as well as a full vehicle cover by WeatherShield complete with the Shelby GT500 logo.

With over 760 horses ready to roll, this car is ready to conquer the competition on the track and/or road course. Not only can you drive it to the track and dominate the quarter-mile, but you can drive it back home in luxury and comfort.

to an impressive interior with leather-trimmed Recaro™ Sport Seats and a rear seat delete. Even more, this Shelby features the Technology Package with B&O Premium Sound System, a 12-inch LCD Digital Instrument Cluster, and MyColor(R) and SYNC 3 compatible with an 8-inch LCD touch screen. Even more, the car comes with Selectable-effort electronic Power-Assist steering (EPAS).

Trim Package with an exposed carbon fiber instrument panel. Track Apps include Launch Control and Electronic Line Lock. Other features include Intelligent Access with Push Button Start, voice-activated navigation, BLIS (blind spot information system) with cross-traffic alert, Sirius XM radio, USB ports, rear-view camera, and Dual-zone Electronic Automatic Temperature Control (DEATC). An Integrated Driver Control (IDC) system allows the driver to select up to five special modes to adjust the ABS, stability control, traction control, steering effort, throttle mapping, MagneRide suspension, and exhaust.
if that weren’t enough, the winner of

also receives the GT500 Track Attack experience at Ford’s Performance Racing School, plus a $1,000 gift certificate for Adam’s Polishes. So go ahead and donate now using the promo code "SHELBY8" before this
